column2: EC's Scoresheet results, https://archive.data.gov.my/data/dataset/senarai-calon-bertanding-pru-14-bagi-kerusi-dewan-undangan-negeri/resource/b26c0a93-ff42-4c20-a987-74a1518c8775, https://undi.info/, The STAR (https://web.archive.org/web/20080424025050/http://elections2.thestar.com.my/election/results/14/14s.html), 1 Sabah (https://ms-my.facebook.com/photo/?fbid=10151561525206004&set=imbasan-keputusan-pru-12-2008dewan-undangan-negeri-sabah-sumber-spr), Keith Rozario Github

DUN Constituency Names follow the EC's Scoresheet results, but the codes for Parliamentary and DUN seats are from Sabah's 2003 Redelineation Report. EC Constituency Maps do not show space between P. and value and N. and value. Pakatan Rakyat was formed after the 2008 elections but there is an electoral pact between PKR, PAS and DAP (however, there were numerous clashes between PRK and DAP. EC has contradictory figures for rejected votes (271 or 273), unreturned votes (1 or 4) and total ballot issued (7713) for DUN Tungku. There are errors in party association found in the information presented by undi.info and the Star website. There are number of candidates who withdrew from the nomination such as Independent Candidate for DUN Senallang (MOHD SAYADI BIN BAKAL), DUN Tanjong Batu (DASUN BIN SUMBIN) and PKR Candidate for DUN Gum-Gum (MUHASPA MOHD HASSAN). 2008_DUN_CANDIDATE_NOTES file shows which candidates require sex category verification. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives
Unique Identifier. For this case, it is the Parliamentary Code
Party/Coalition (with Component Party) who won the seat
Indicator if there was one contestant for the said election. If yes, value Y is affixed. If none, it is left blank
Total Elector count using the 2008 Elections, which was built on Principal Electoral Roll of 2007 that was gazetted on 5th February 2008
The difference between the highest valid votes and second highest valid votes
Proportion of Total Ballots Issued as a share of Total Electorate
Total Number of Ballot Papers issued at the poll (including postal ballot papers issued to voters and rejected ballot papers but excluding spoilt ballot papers)
Number of ballots papers issued but no returned (including postal ballot papers)
Total number of rejected ballot papers
Total number of votes by electors
Barisan Nasional Valid Vote for the Candidate
Indicated if the contestant has lost deposit. If yes, value 'Lost Deposit' is affixed. If none, it is left blank
